TCS Presents SPEAKERBOX in association with Ministry of Sound
View this email in a web browser
Challenge grads it’s time to re-unite with your crew from the summer and have a big old party. Playing on the night:
Mikill Pane (live) Jodie Connor (live) Scruffizer (live) Dream Mclean (live) Dj Fusion More tbc... & You
If you want to perform on stage alongside all our artists upload a video of you performing to YouTube and call it 'The challenge talent competition [your name]'.
SPEAKERBOX CODE {!Contact.Promotional_Code__c} Get your mates who haven't signed up for The Challenge yet to sign up this year. They must use your individual SPEAKERBOX code when they sign up online.
When they use your code they get a £15 discount off of the full price of the program and you will be sent a free ticket to SPEAKERBOX.
Sign up 5 people for VIP entry.
If you have any questions at all, contact us at TCSSpeakerbox@the-challenge.org
